data: Refer to Neonatal Drug Manual and/or pharmacist for dose interval

Consider therapeutic drug monitoring with antibiotic therapy beyond 48 hours. Place therapeutic drug monitoring instruction orders as required. Consult pharmacy for subsequent gentamicin doses and levels for patients less than 30 weeks. For suspected meningitis, select ampicillin 100 mg/kg/dose
50 mg/kg, IV, q12h interval, order duration: 7 day, first dose: STAT

Draw level 30 minutes after the end of the 2nd infusion
